name: Kaapelipeli: The Cable Game
storyline:
Your job is to guide a lonely project engineer to the transformer while avoiding angry landowners, various obstacles and endangered animals. You can shoot land use -Contracts against enemies and crush rocks with Drills. Remember to place marking sticks and pick up boosts along the way to get points and to increase your stats.
After you have reached the Transformer, it's time to DIG. While in digging-mode, player loses points more easily and must follow specific routes (the one with most marking sticks) to get more points in turn.

While playing Kaapelipeli: The Cable Game, you can experience over 35 levels with different terrains and inhabitants and meet beautiful yet dangerous flora & fauna. You may explore offices, towns, rural areas, forests, arctic-areas, bonus levels and perhaps make some friends along the way =)
summary: Kaapelipeli: The Cable Game is the world's only game about planning underground power cables. Playing is simple at first: You need to guide the lonely project engineer to the power transformer and avoid angry landowners, various obstacles and weather effects while you do so. You can even "shoot" land use contracts against your enemies and use drills to destroy rocks and other things, making your job even easier. However, things tend to change as you progress...
